---
order: 3
title:
  zh-CN: 渐显
  en-US: Fade in
---

## zh-CN

切换效果为渐显。

## en-US

Slides use fade for transition.

```jsx
import { Carousel } from 'antd';

ReactDOM.render(
  <Carousel effect="fade">
    <div>
      <h3>1</h3>
    </div>
    <div>
      <h3>2</h3>
    </div>
    <div>
      <h3>3</h3>
    </div>
    <div>
      <h3>4</h3>
    </div>
  </Carousel>,
  mountNode,
);
```

```css
/* For demo */
.ant-carousel .slick-slide {
  text-align: center;
  height: 160px;
  line-height: 160px;
  background: #364d79;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.ant-carousel .slick-slide h3 {
  color: #fff;
}
```
